title: Katie Price shares adorable video of herself kissing daughter Bunny on the lips

Katie Price isn't shy with affection for her kids.

The mum of five shared a short clip with her 2.1 million Instagram followers of her showering youngest daughter Bunny, five, with big smooches.

Mother and daughter both giggle as Katie holds Bunny's head to kiss her on the lips.

The former glamour model, 41, captioned the video with a string of pink heart emojis.

Earlier she posted a snap of her little girl, looking very smart and glamorous with a pink jumper tied across her shoulders.

Katie wrote: "my cheeky Bunny bops."

Fans have been loving the video, gushing over Katie's mum skills.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

One wrote: "Awwww what a gorgeous mumma you are @officialkatieprice."

"She's such a cutie!" said another.

A third was straight to the point: "Great mum and lovely children."

A fourth was a diehard Katie fan: "Such a beautiful mum, they are so lucky to have you and you them xx."

(Image: Instagram)

Some trolls, though, decided to hit out at Katie for being so public with her affections for her kids.

One penned: "If she was really a good mother she wouldn't need a camera set up to capture such moments.

"The most staged mother daughter show ever. Notice how she looks up twice to see who is watching? What a joke."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

It's not the first time she's shared such a display.

A holiday snap from Turkey showed Katie planting a smacker on the lips of her eldest, 17 year old Harvey.

Harvey used the photo to mark his triumphant return to Instagram.

"Welcome back Harvey!" wrote an adoring fan.

Another told Harvey he's "super cool", while a third was a fan of Autism's Got Talent, which Harvey competed in.

They wrote: "Harvey, we just watched you play the keyboard at Autism's Got Talent on TV here in Australia. You did a great job, frog man! Hope you get to play live again soon. You're a musical genius mate."
description: Katie shared a cute clip of her and five year old Bunny enjoying some affectionate mother-daughter time
